title: MoparMiningLLC
author: MoparMiningLLC
created_time: December 05, 2022, 12:45:45 AMLast edit: December 11, 2022, 10:08:09 PM by MoparMiningLLC
content: Balletcrypto has produced a Limited Edition wallet on behalf of MissTeenCrypto.Balletcrypto made only 75 total of these wallets and have provided me with 23 of them to auction here.They are the plastic (not metal) version and are BTC Only and denominated as .0001 BTC and are being auctioned off unloaded.You can follow/view MissTeenCrypto on her Twitter: https://twitter.com/missteencryptoI know the Balletcrypto stock image shows denomination as .0005 but these are denominated as .0001 - seeactual picture of one I have on hand.STARTING BID PER LOT: 0.0000BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**bids will be on a LIFO basis so bid accordingly END TIME: DECEMBER 11th, 2022, 5:00 PM Eastern Time**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC.SHIPPING: Based on location and preference

Give me a minute and I will also add an actual picture of one.
